args.text:
Top 5 kayaking routes in Sweden:
1. Stockholm Archipelago - 150 km, easy to moderate difficulty
2. Göta Canal - 190 km, easy difficulty
3. Stora Le - 60 km, moderate difficulty
4. Klarälven River - 100 km, easy to moderate difficulty
5. Vindel River - 350 km, moderate to difficult difficulty
